participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, determined, and family-oriented. Enjoys expressing herself through fashion and values education.
participant_1.background: I do not have any kids, but I love to spend time with my nieces and nephews. I like watching sports. I will study for my upcoming exams while others may watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube. I enjoy spending time with my family. I'm a secret fashion designer, who is hiding my passion from my conservative family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easily agitated but caring, with a pragmatic approach to life. Values personal health and has a complex relationship with family.
participant_2.background: My weight is 160 pounds. I'm easily agitated. I drink milk to help me digest my large meals. I don’t get along with my family. I listened to my favorite songs on my tablet while getting ready for my last birthday.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing alright, how about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm really excited for my upcoming exams.
Oh, good luck! What are you studying for?
Thanks! I'm studying business and marketing.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of career are you hoping to have?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going into fashion design.
Oh, that's great! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks! I hope so. I'm not sure how my family will react to it, though. They're not very supportive of my fashion choices.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure they'll come around eventually.
I hope so. It's just hard because I'm not sure if I can be open with them about it.
Yeah, I understand. It's always hard when you don't feel supported by the people who are closest to you.
Exactly. But I'm determined to make my dreams happen, no matter what.
That's the spirit! I'm sure you'll do great
